mapper.select: SELECT board_idx, title, hit_cnt, DATE_FORMAT(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_datetime FROM t_board WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY board_idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board ( title, contents, created_datetime, creator_id, updated_datetime, updater_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, NOW(), 'admin', 0, 'admin' )
